original_text: He thought about what he should do. Then an angel came from the Lord God to see him. The angel came to Joseph while he was dreaming. The angel said, ‘Joseph, you who are from the family of King David, take Mary home as your wife. Do not be afraid to do that. The baby that is growing inside her is from the Holy Spirit.
korean_text: 이 일을 생각할 때에 주의 사자가 현몽하여 이르되 다윗의 자손 요셉아 네 아내 마리아 데려오기를 무서워하지 말라 그에게 잉태된 자는 성령으로 된 것이라

sentences.original_text: He thought about what he should do
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신이 무엇을 해야 할지 생각했다

sentences.original_text: Then an angel came from the Lord God
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 한 천사가 주 하나님께로부터 왔다

sentences.original_text: Joseph, you who are from the family of King David
take Mary home as your wife
Do not be afraid to do that
The baby that is growing inside her
